revision.text:
{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = Archer-T2UH-01.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = AC600 High Gain Wireless Dual Band USB Adapter |caption2 = |pp = http://www.tp-link.com/lk/products/details/cat-11_Archer-T2UH.html |sp = |dl = |wikidevi = |wikipedia = |brand = TP-LINK |model = Archer T2U |submodelappend = |submodel = H |revision = |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = January 31, 2015 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/TP-LINK_Archer_T2UH |sernum = |wlclass = AC600 |series = Archer T |if = USB |if_bus_version = 2.0 |ifconnector = Male A |formfactor = dongle (w/ large antenna) |vendor_id = 148f |device_id = 761a |subvendor_id = |subdevice_id = |id_string = |windosid = |fcc_id = TE7T2UH |icid = 8853A-T2UH |boardid = |ecc_id = |oui = 84:16:F9 |chip1 = MediaTek;MT7610U;MT7610UN; |chip2 = |chip3 = |chip4 = |antconn = RP-SMA |antenna = |txchains = 1 |rxchains = 1 |sstreams = 1 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |802.11ac = 433 |802.11n = 150 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = |windriv = |is_manuf = Yes |addchip = |flags = |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 11/21/2014 |estreldate = |price = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B00UZRVY12 |asin_country = US |asin2 = B00P115WMY |asin_country2 = GB |country = China |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "1306212T2U-1.0" and "Rev:1.0sp1" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. Specs rehashed.. * One 3dBi external antennas (RP-SMA) * 802.11ac 5GHz 1T1R (433 Mbps) * 802.11n 2.4GHz 1T1R (150 Mbps) * USB 2.0 only Notes: With kernel 4.4.41 and driver mt7610u_sta only 2.4GHz works {{See also|TP-LINK Archer T series|TP-LINK}} ==Pictures==
'''Retail Images''' File:Archer-T2UH-01.jpg| File:Archer T2UH un V1 826.jpg|
